personal.name: Tylor Le
personal.title: Frontend Developer | UI/UX & Full‑Stack & GenAI
personal.summary: Frontend & UI/UX focused developer currently completing a Bachelor of ICT (Software Technology). Experience delivering responsive, component‑driven React/Vue interfaces, design systems, data visualisation dashboards, and small full‑stack features (PHP + MariaDB + REST). Comfortable with Figma to code handoff, unit testing (NUnit/.NET, C#) and rapid prototyping with modern JS tooling (Vite, TypeScript).
personal.elevator_pitch: I design and build accessible, performant web experiences—translating user research and design systems into clean, testable front‑end code while still diving into data, backend APIs and automation when needed.

salary_location.salary_expectations: Negotiable based on scope & growth opportunity
salary_location.work_authorization: Full-time work rights in Australia for 5+ years

achievements_star.situation: Need for scalable, configurable UI components slowing feature delivery
achievements_star.task: Create a reuse strategy and component system in React/TypeScript
achievements_star.action: Built context‑aware, prop‑driven components + responsive layout breakpoints (1440/1024/640/360) and automated CI/CD via GitHub + Cloudflare
achievements_star.result: Increased development efficiency ~40% and reduced deployment/update time >15% while boosting engagement ~30% via pyramid navigation personalization

achievements_star.situation: Inconsistent design assets causing iteration delays
achievements_star.task: Unify components into a scalable multi‑platform design system
achievements_star.action: Converted styled React components into Figma design tokens & auto‑layout patterns; rationalized 24 form user flows into 4 layout archetypes
achievements_star.result: Cut design iteration steps >50% and improved productivity ~40%, exceeding sprint completion targets by ≥15%

achievements_star.situation: Need to increase memberships and service registrations
achievements_star.task: Provide contextual customer engagement & resolve onboarding issues
achievements_star.action: Proactively assisted with registration, troubleshooting technical issues, clarifying benefits
achievements_star.result: Raised sales/service registrations ~20% and loyalty retention ~35%

achievements_star.situation: Tool underperforming with design and performance gaps

achievements_star.action: Analyzed 1000+ survey responses, ran Hotjar usability reviews, refactored styled components, redesigned key flows
achievements_star.result: Achieved ~900% traffic increase and ~20% server cost reduction via efficiency improvements

behavioral: Describe a time you used user data to drive a redesign.
Tell me about collaborating with engineers to formalize a design system.
Explain how you handle balancing speed vs. quality in UI delivery.
technical: How do you structure a scalable component library in React?
Explain approaches to responsive design across multiple breakpoints.
Walk through optimizing perceived performance in a SPA.
